sentences.en: Eg : One who has a compulsive and unrelenting need to work.
sentences.cn: 工作狂难以抑制的和不松懈的需要工作的人.

sentences.en: Given her unrelenting hate for Illidan, his continued good health is obviously a very bad sign.
sentences.cn: 鉴于她对伊利丹不可逆转的仇恨, 他的健在对她而言是个凶兆.

sentences.en: He was unrelenting in his pursuit of legal mandate.
sentences.cn: 他坚决要求得到合法的托管权.

sentences.en: His writings demonstrated an unrelenting strength of life through the portrayal of uninhabited romantic atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 他的小说在粗犷的浪漫主义氛围中,呈现出不屈的生命力量.

sentences.en: I answered yes, and he became an unrelenting sleuth.
sentences.cn: 在我肯定地回答他后, 他便成了一名不屈不挠的“侦探”.

sentences.en: No settling . Just pure and unrelenting tenacity.
sentences.cn: 仅仅是依靠纯粹的,不屈不挠的毅力.

sentences.en: People were buffeted by unrelenting inflation.
sentences.cn: 人们受到全无缓解的通货膨胀的冲击.

sentences.en: She established her authority with unrelenting thoroughness.
sentences.cn: 她坚定地树立起自己绝对的权威。

sentences.en: the unrelenting pressures of the job
The words fell, unrelenting, on his ears.
sentences.cn: 冷酷无情的话传到他的耳里来.

sentences.en: This time the chase would be long and hard and unrelenting.
sentences.cn: 这一次的追踪将是长期的、艰难的、不屈不挠的.

sentences.en: Unrelenting self - criticism often goes hand in hand with depression and anxiety and it may even depression.
sentences.cn: 无休止的 自我 怀疑通常会带来沮丧和焦虑,甚至会导致抑郁症.

sentences.en: While most pregnant women face moderate stress, a smaller slice have unrelenting, chronic strain.
sentences.cn: 大部分孕妇面临中等强度的压力, 不过也有少部分人有着长期未疏解的压力.

sentences.en: Wind and rain are no strangers to Massachusetts, but this rain was torrential and unrelenting.
sentences.cn: 刮风下雨对马萨诸塞州人是司空见惯的, 但这一次却是风狂雨骤.
